channel.title: node.js on CoreUI
channel.description: Recent content in node.js on CoreUI

item.title: How to Migrate from create-react-app to Vite?
item.description: In the evolving landscape of web development, keeping up with efficient tools and processes is crucial for any developer looking to enhance performance and maintainability. Vite has emerged as a natural successor to Create React App (CRA) for many looking to build modern, single-page React applications. In this comprehensive guide, we’ll walk through the steps to migrate your project from CRA to Vite, with a focus on practicality and ease.

item.title: How to fix “SyntaxError: Cannot use import statement outside a module”?
item.description: In your development journey, encountering errors is a norm, but some can leave you scratching your head. One such instance is when you’re met with “Cannot use import statement outside a module” in JavaScript. This error can be a hurdle, but with the right guidance, you can overcome it easily. In this article, we’ll explore the why and how of fixing this common issue, equipping you with the tools to continue coding without interruptions.
